TunableList.name: COLLECTION_COMBINING_TUNING
TunableList.description: Mapping of collectible id, to states that we allow for collectible combining.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: ID of the collectible that can be combined.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Possible states that can be combined on a collectible. Mapping of state values that can be combined to get a new state

TunableList.name: combination_mapping
TunableList.description: Mapping of possible father-mother states to which new state can they generate on the newly created collectible. e.g. If collectible A has green color state, and collectible B has blue color states the resulting state can be a Green color state. This means the outcome of the interaction will look for a collectible that has this resulting state value.

TunableTuple.description: State combinations to create a new state on the result collectible.

TunableList.name: states_to_combine
TunableList.description: Any states tuned here will be transfered from the combine collectibles to the resulting object. For example: Frogs will transfer their color and pattern states.

Tunable.description: State that can be inherited by the new collectible.
